alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 8:01PM CST until February 18 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pascagoula At Merrill affecting George, Jackson and Greene Counties. For the Pascagoula River...including Merrill...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Pascagoula At Merrill. * WHEN...Until late Friday night. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, water approaches homes in west Merrill. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Monday the stage was 22.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.5 feet Wednesday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Friday evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
